column3: Could you format the comments in a Doxygen-friendly way? For example, it'd be nice for those clicking through Doxygen to have the automatic link generation work: http://www.doxygen.nl/manual/autolink.html

> Could you format the comments in a Doxygen-friendly way?\n\nTo my knowledge, these are already formatted for Doxygen... both `/** ... */` and `//!` are recognized, and the class/method references should autolink properly.

Thanks for the reviews. Have fleshed out some explanatory doc around why local services don't change and have fixed the Doxygen autolinking.

![Selection_160](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73197/64705870-a6263380-d47e-11e9-91f2-b20026a529b1.png)

Could explain why this is `const`, i.e. impossible to change after the connection. And maybe also how this interacts with IBD or background indexes that are turned on when the chain is already synced.
